p: A linear regression analysis with the stepwise method was used to measure the association of working or not working with COVID-19 patients and coping strategies with levels of perceived stress. The total score of the perceived stress scale was set as dependent variable; working or not with COVID-19 patients and the five coping styles as measured by the COPE-NVI-25 (positive attitude, problem solving, avoidance strategies, turning to religion and social support) were entered as independent variables.
